content.body: Can someone confirm whether the change in https://github.com/mdn/content/pull/6255/files is correct per-spec?
sideshowbarker: IMO, it seems this PR just use slight different words but don't really have any real difference with the old sentences.
content.formatted_body: sideshowbarker: IMO, it seems this PR just use slight different words but don't really have any real difference with the old sentences.

content.body: sideshowbarker: Oh, I think I missed the interesting thing it the PR, chrome/ff inconsistency :) It seems V8 don't keep order of a, b as the original order in the array when call compareFn(a, b) ... Spec seems say nothing about that.
content.formatted_body: sideshowbarker: Oh, I think I missed the interesting thing it the PR, chrome/ff inconsistency :) It seems V8 don't keep order of a, b as the original order in the array when call compareFn(a, b) ... Spec seems say nothing about that.
